message: We just redesigned our site: http://mysyncpad.com any feedback?

Hey, I have a few little things. The old layout felt a little less dense. Although it's nice, the graphic of the three devices in the new page seems chopped up -- the old graphic did a good job of displaying 3 mirrored devices, this doesn't seem so evident. I think the old graphic conveyed that the three devices were connected by their positioning -- the two items on the end pointing toward the middle.

On my 15" MBP, there's plenty of detail text (all the stuff below the main graphic) showing up... I think it might feel less dense if there were a little space between the graphic/ buy buttons and the details. I like the price / arrows pointing toward the buttons.

Thanks, those are all excellent points. For the images I had to relay on stuff I found online, but I'm considering to shoot the picture myself so I can get the desired angles (especially for the phone)
